segments.text: Good afternoon . I come here specially to pick up my tickets . I booked it last month.This is my reservation note .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am terribly sorry . You didn't come to reconfirm recently.You should have come to pick up your ticket three days ago since it's an international flight , any reservation without reconfirmation within 72 hours will be cancelled .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I have been so busy all these days.Well , is there any other ticket available ? I want the next one .
segments.speaker: S1
